HomePage.title: Dara Transilvania
HomePage.subtitle: Your trusted partner for frozen products
HomePage.aboutUsText: With vast experience in storage and distribution, Dara Transilvania honors client requests with the best product offers and logistics services. We operate in a European-standard cold storage facility, ready to serve you.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.subtitle: The Dara Transilvania Story
AboutPage.missionText: Dara Transilvania's mission is to provide frozen products of the highest quality, maintaining strict food safety standards and ensuring efficient distribution throughout the country.
AboutPage.experienceText: With over 15 years of experience in the food industry, our team understands the specific needs of the HoReCa sector and offers personalized solutions for each client.
AboutPage.qualityText: All our products are carefully selected and stored under optimal conditions, using modern refrigeration technology to preserve freshness and nutritional value.
